# Change Log

## 0.1.0 (2013-06-17)

  * Upgrade to mongoose 3.6.11
  * Switch from expect.js to mocha for tests
  * Add schema validation to ensure unique role names

## 0.0.3 (2013-03-09)

  * Fix broken URL in README

  * Add .npmignore
  * Clean up .gitignore
  * Clean up package.json
  * Minor README edits

## 0.0.1 (2013-03-09)

  * First version
